A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
As a die hard Star Wars fan\, this movie just stole away everything that Star Wars stands for. No spirit\, no coherency\, and so many plotholes\, that even the plotholes have plotholes.

The Force Awakens was basically a copy of A New Hope.
The Last Jedi was basically a copy of Empire Strikes Back\, with elements of Return of the Jedi.

The Phantom Menace is no longer the worst Star Wars film. There's a new champion - The Last Jedi.

This film does not have a Star Wars feel to it - This film is not Star Wars.
